author: yukie_crypto
content: Hello guys! I want to learn solidity and smart contracts, but i don`t like Remix ide. I tried to set up vscode and truffle, and deployed my contract to ganache. How do i access contract methods from ganache CLI? Help me pls

author: sky.cactus
content: Please seek out ganache support.  This server is for research and development of Ethereum itself, not all of the stuff built on top of it.

author: burpnado
content: How do I get current miner.gasLimit setting from a running geth node?

author: timbeiko
content: I don't think you can (might be wrong!) but you can set it via JSON RPC to what you'd like it to be: https://geth.ethereum.org/docs/rpc/ns-miner#miner_setGasLimit
